subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Jack Corcoran, a sophomore from Atlantic City, has claimed the starting fullback position at Rutgers, which means he gets to block for Heisman Trophy contender Ray Rice.
snippet: Jack Corcoran, a sophomore from Atlantic City, has claimed the starting fullback position at Rutgers, which means he gets to block for Heisman Trophy contender Ray Rice.
